snippet.title: Judas Official Reveal Trailer | Game Awards 2022
snippet.description:
Judas is a single player, narrative first person shooter developed by Ghost Story Games, a studio led by Ken Levine, Creative Director of System Shock 2, BioShock, and BioShock Infinite.

A disintegrating starship. A desperate escape plan. 
You are the mysterious and troubled Judas. Your only hope for survival is to make or break alliances with your worst enemies. Will you work together to fix what you broke – or will you leave it to burn?

Add to your wishlist now: 
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/judas
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/388860/Judas/
PS5 & Xbox Series X|S wishlist coming soon

Official Site:  https://www.GhostStoryGames.com
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/GhostStoryGames
Facebook:  https://facebook.com/GhostStoryGames
Instagram:  https://instagram.com/GhostStoryGames

ESRB RATING PENDING: May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit www.esrb.org for rating information.
